## Introduction

This document will explore the modeling options for the trawl data prior to adding it to the Shiny app.


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

# Still issues with writing to csv: use trawl_all dataframe from trawl_data_wrangling 
trawl <- trawl_all
```


Now for some modeling attempts:

```{r}
sp_list <- unique(trawl$field_id)

trawl_sub <- trawl %>% 
  filter(field_id == "pinfish") %>% 
  mutate(date = ymd(date),
         doy = yday(date))

lm1 <- lm(log(catch_100m + 1) ~ doy + I(doy^2) + I(doy^3), data = trawl_sub)

```
